001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.DurationSupport;
004
005public record Printer(Bach bach) {
006
007  public void print(ToolRun run) {
008    print(run, false, 4);
009  }
010
011  public void print(ToolRun run, boolean summarize, int indentation) {
012    var output = run.output();
013    var errors = run.errors();
014    if (!output.isEmpty()) bach.out().println(output.indent(indentation).stripTrailing());
015    if (!errors.isEmpty()) bach.err().println(errors.indent(indentation).stripTrailing());
016    if (summarize) {
017      var printer = run.isError() ? bach.err() : bach.out();
018      printer.printf(
019          "Tool '%s' run with %d argument%s took %s and finished with exit code %d%n",
020          run.name(),
021          run.args().size(),
022          run.args().size() == 1 ? "" : "s",
023          DurationSupport.toHumanReadableString(run.duration()),
024          run.code());
025    }
026  }
027}
